alert.note: Alert for Little River; Miller; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 02 at 9:35PM CST until March 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 55, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS LITTLE RIVER MILLER SEVIER IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST OKLAHOMA MCCURTAIN IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 21 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS ANGELINA BOWIE CAMP CASS CHEROKEE FRANKLIN GREGG HARRISON MARION MORRIS NACOGDOCHES PANOLA RED RIVER RUSK SABINE SAN AUGUSTINE SHELBY SMITH TITUS UPSHUR WOOD THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BIG SANDY, BOGATA, BROKEN BOW, CARTHAGE, CENTER, CLARKSVILLE, DAINGERFIELD, DE QUEEN, GILMER, HAWKINS, HEMPHILL, HENDERSON, HUGHES SPRINGS, IDABEL, JACKSONVILLE, JEFFERSON, LINDEN, LONE STAR, LONGVIEW, LUFKIN, MARSHALL, MINEOLA, MOUNT PLEASANT, MOUNT VERNON, NACOGDOCHES, NAPLES, OMAHA, PINELAND, PITTSBURG, QUEEN CITY, QUITMAN, RUSK, SAN AUGUSTINE, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, TYLER, AND WINNSBORO.
